meanings.definition: To utter a short, sharp cry or bark.
meanings.sent1: The puppy yelped when it saw its reflection.
meanings.sent2: The dog yelped loudly when someone knocked on the door.
meanings.sent3: The cat yelped in surprise when it accidentally stepped on a toy.
meanings.sent4: The child yelped with joy as they opened their birthday present.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel yelped in fear as the hawk swooped down.

meanings.sent1: She yelped in pain when she stubbed her toe.
meanings.sent2: The dog yelped and ran away from the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent3: He yelped with excitement when he won the race.
meanings.sent4: The singer yelped out the high note flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The child yelped with surprise when the balloon popped.
